Sentencas: Carbonate looping (CaL) has been shown to be less energy-intensive when compared to mature carbon capture technologies.
Titulo: Demonstration of a kW-scale solid oxide fuel cell-calciner for power generation and production of calcined materials

Sentencas: Further reduction in the efficiency penalties can be achieved by employing a more efficient source of heat for the calcination process, instead of oxy-fuel combustion.
Titulo: Demonstration of a kW-scale solid oxide fuel cell-calciner for power generation and production of calcined materials

Sentencas: In this study, a kW-scale solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)-integrated calciner was designed and developed to evaluate the technical feasibility of simultaneously generating power and driving the calcination process using the high-grade heat of the anode off-gas.
Titulo: Demonstration of a kW-scale solid oxide fuel cell-calciner for power generation and production of calcined materials

Sentencas: Such a system can be integrated with CaL systems, or employed as a negative-emission technology, where the calcines are used to capture CO2 from the atmosphere.
Titulo: Demonstration of a kW-scale solid oxide fuel cell-calciner for power generation and production of calcined materials

Sentencas: The demonstration unit consisted of a planar SOFC stack, operating at 750 degrees C, and a combined afterburner/calciner to combust hydrogen slip from the anode off-gas, and thermally decompose magnesite, dolomite, and limestone.
Titulo: Demonstration of a kW-scale solid oxide fuel cell-calciner for power generation and production of calcined materials

Sentencas: The demonstrator generated up to 2 kW(el, DC) power, achieved a temperature in the range of 530-550 degrees C at the inlet of the afterburner, and up to 678 degrees C in the calciner, which was sufficient to demonstrate full calcination of magnesite, and partial calcination of dolomite.
Titulo: Demonstration of a kW-scale solid oxide fuel cell-calciner for power generation and production of calcined materials

Sentencas: However, in order to achieve the temperature required for calcination of limestone, further scale-up and heat integration are needed.
Titulo: Demonstration of a kW-scale solid oxide fuel cell-calciner for power generation and production of calcined materials

Sentencas: These results confirmed technical feasibility of the SOFC-calciner concept for production of calcined materials either for the market or for direct air capture (DAC).
Titulo: Demonstration of a kW-scale solid oxide fuel cell-calciner for power generation and production of calcined materials
